original_text: and shall take part of the blood of the bull and put it on the horns of the altar with your finger, and the rest of the blood you shall pour out at the base of the altar.
korean_text: 그 피를 네 손가락으로 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피 전부를 제단 밑에 쏟을지며

sentences.original_text: and shall take part of the blood of the bull
and put it on the horns of the altar with your finger
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손가락으로 그것을 제단의 뿔에 바르고

sentences.original_text: and the rest of the blood you shall pour out at the base of the altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 나머지 피는 제단 밑에 쏟아야 하느니라
